column3: School of Science, Engineering and the Environment
column5: Help to build a better sounding world with a postgraduate degree in Acoustics.Delivered in full and part-time study pathways, either on campus or online, we've designed a course to nurture your specialist knowledge, so you're ready to develop a career as a future leader in audio product development, noise consultancy or sound management.Recommended for numerate science graduates looking to join the acoustics and audio profession, you will benefit from using world-class facilities learning alongside an academic team at the forefront of industry-focused research.International applicant? Please check international intakes for the latest information and application
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
